description.value:
Woven by fey seamstresses as rewards for servants of nature, countless leaves continually changing colors in autumnal hues comprise autumn's embrace, a suit of +2 invisibility resilient leaf weave. Leaves shed from the armor as they might fall in autumn. When activating the armor's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Invisibility] property rune, you disappear in a swirl of colorful leaves.

Activate 2 command, envision (aura)

Frequency once per day

Effect You call forth a storm of leaves from autumn's embrace. These leaves swirl in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] for 1 minute. Creatures within the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed], and creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within the leaves. However, you can see through this concealment. You can Dismiss the activation.
